WEB BASED MANAGEMENT TOOL FOR YOUR CO-OPERATIVE HOUSING SOCIETY

Society Management.com offers you hassle-free platform to transform your society, making it highly functional and easily manageable. Developed by an expert team handling society matters, this software enables even a newcomer to participate in the management process.

Next

Members / Managing Committee / Service Provider

Members

Members with appropriate authority.

Managing Committee

With various templates for the meeting, and various standard agenda items and suggestions of various minutes against possible decisions of the Managing Committee, this is highly useful even for a small society.

  • Learn More

Service Provider

Define the Rates, and the System will calculate the maintenance charges under different heads and for different types of premises.
